name: AdvanceCarePlanningDocumentation
title: Advance Care Planning Documentation
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent advance care planning documentation.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model category related to documentation.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with advance care planning documentation),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to any type of documentation other than for advance care planning.)

Advance care planning including the explanation and discussion of advance directives such as standard forms (with completion of such forms, when performed), by the physician or other qualified health care professional; each additional 30 minutes (List separately in addition to code for primary procedure)
